DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare motor strength knee extension two group patient . One group receive proximal thigh block femoral nerve , one receiving distal thigh block saphenous nerve . The secondary objective compare pain relief functional outcome two group .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Femoral vs Saphenous Nerve Blocks Function After ACL Repair

Skeletally immature 3 . Previous knee surgery 4 . Inability provide inform consent 5 . ACL reconstruction tendon repair
